snippet: Football officials from the United States, Canada and Mexico are likely to meet next year to discuss a joint bid for the 2026 World Cup, CONCACAF President Victor Montagliani said on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Football officials from the United States, Canada and Mexico are likely to meet next year to discuss a joint bid for the 2026 World Cup, CONCACAF President Victor Montagliani said on Wednesday.

headline.main: US-Canada-Mexico 2026 World Cup Bid a Possibility: CONCACAF President
headline.print_headline: US-Canada-Mexico 2026 World Cup Bid a Possibility: CONCACAF President
